TitleEnglish: Heroes of the Ancient Olympic Games
SummaryEnglish: Follow the adventures of Mao, a Japanese teenager and aspiring runner, as she travels back to ancient Greece to learn about the Olympic Games.

1.TitleEnglish: Leonidas of Rhodes - The greatest Olympian of the Ancient World ?
1.SummaryEnglish: Mao travels back to ancient Greece and meets Leonidas of Rhodes, who teaches how important it is to stick with it and never giving up!

2.TitleEnglish: The  inspiring story of the six-time Olympic champion Milon of Croton
2.SummaryEnglish: When a younger opponent defeats legendary wrestler Milon of Croton after winning six times at Olympic games, Mao understands if you learn from defeat, you have not lost at all.

3.TitleEnglish: How Kyniska of Sparta became the first woman ever to win at the Olympic Games
3.SummaryEnglish: When Kyniska, princess of Sparta, is denied competing for being a woman. She finds the way to win the chariot race and become the first women to champion at the ancient Olympic Games.

4.TitleEnglish: How a secret source of motivation helps Ageas of Argos to win the Dolichos race
4.SummaryEnglish: Mao tries to stop Ageas of Argos from running back to his home town, 100km away, to notify his victory right after winning a gruelling Dolichos race.

5.TitleEnglish: The incredible story of a mother who risked her life to see her son compete
5.SummaryEnglish: Mao helps Kallipateira of Rhodes avoid the ban for married women and enter the stadium to see her son compete, dressed like a man pretending to be his coach.
